landing.bio: To work as a Software Engineer applying my expertise in the field of developing, testing, and maintenance to cater to the specific needs of the people. I wish to work in a team of motivated individuals who wish to work towards the advancement of the company and its goals.

project.name: E-Commerce
project.about: A website where a buyer can view and purchase products

project.name: Blog using Django
project.about: A simple blog where a user can sign up, log in, post, comment and delete a post

project.name: Virtual Learning Environment for Kids
project.about: A program written using Java for kids to learn Alphabets, Numbers, Colors, and Rhymes,

interests.paragraphOne: I love to watch movies and TV Series. In my leisure I go through tech blogs and magazines. I do love travelling also during long vacation.
